dialogues.Fat:
[1]			 		Let's go! Time to load up!  	YLLO, a professor of archaeology lowers his veil.  
[2]		Shit! Temp's dropping! We should have 		left this rock an hour ago!  
[3]		Hey teach! This rock's starting to freeze! 		Get your ass back hre!  
[4]		Oh my God . . . what the hell is . . .  
[5]		This is Beowulf approaching from 		sector fifteen.  	Through the front windshield we see - -  	GRENDEL, a class IV Catamaran Transport. It looks like two huge 	torpedoes attached by three thin walkways. Not new, but by no means old.  
[6]			 		Grendel to Grendel's mother, we are enroute.  
[7]		I'll need the sergeant's okay on that.  
[8]		Alright, relax. 20 minutes. Soon 		as we've passed Tara's rings we'll 		make the course correction.  
[9]		Disengage auto-pilot.  
[10]		New COURSE, seven-eighty-one.  
[11]		Engage auto pilot.  	Suddenly, Bernie is ripped from his chair! Electricity SHOOTS through 	the console 	as Bernie's DIALOG becomes jibberish.

dialogues.Kicker:
[1]		Yo, Teach, what the fuck?  
[2]		Get your ass back to the shuttle. 		I'll check it out.  	KICKER moves past the group and into the Van.

[4]		Back to the shuttle! All of you! 		I'll find them.  
[5]		We don't have time for this shit.  	As they pass we see a section of the jagged metal ceiling twitch and 	squeeze together. That can't be a good thing . . .  	STONEY and Adrienne stop at a huge metal door. Above the door . . . 
[6]		Now wait a minute! I don't think you 		should open that door.  
[7]		We're outta here!  	Yllo pulls away, leans over the frozen girl, grabs the frozen string of 	blood and -CRACK-breaks it off.

[13]		We need another exit! I'll hold 'em off! 		Teach, find a way out!

[15]		Leave him behind!  
[16]		Then duck.  	CHA-CHUNK . . he cocks his grenade launcher and fires at the ceiling.  	KABLOOM!! Rocks and falling debris reveal the violent surface above.  
[17]		Make it happen!  
[18]		They've got me! Let go!  
[19]			 		This will be!  	The others dive for the ground as -  -  	KAFOOM! A FIREBALL rises up out of the hole!  
[20]		Oh man, what the hell happened?  
[21]		Damn. Are they playing?

[23]

[26]		Fuckin A...

dialogues.Azrael:
[1]		I've got my project. What are you losers 		gonna do?  
[2]		Cool . . . check out my arm.  
[3]		Not a problem?!  	Kay-Em injects him again.  
[4]		I'm missing a fucking arm heeeerrrr- 			 		Oh, that's dreamy.  	The lasers begin strategically slicing through hinges.  
[5]			 				That is soooo cool!  	Kicker cracks the door and tosses his gadget.  
[6]		Oh shit I forgot my arm!  
[7]		Watch it punk, I'm armed.  
[8]		You'll pay for that.  	Dallas and the grunts laugh.  
[9]		Lucky?!  	Azrael sits in a large machine. This is . . .  	The NANO-TECH 2000. It can repair non-fatal injuries with the use of 	Nano-Technology.  	Azrael is scanned by the NT-2000 and so is his injury. It goes into 	action as articulated mechanics begin to re-attach his arm.  
[10]		Another hour and I'd have lost 		the arm.  
[11]		I better get extra credit for this shit.  
[12]		Don't I deserve a sick day or some 		shit like that?  	Yllo exits. 
[13]		You got lucky.  
[14]		Speaking of which, duck!  	Dallas hits the deck as Azrael FIRES, disintegrating another. Beyond it 	lunge a half dozen more.  Dallas and Azrael scramble to their feet, 	take aim, when --  
[15]		What the?!  
[16]		Pause play.  	Suddenly the aliens freeze in place. Jason stares at them, then turns to 	Dallas and Azrael.  
[17]		Hey cool. They brought ancient 		hockey guy back to life.  	Jason walks up to them. Titls his head like a dog hearing a high-pitched 	whistle.  	Why aren't they running.  
[18]		Hey! We're playing a game here. 		Get off the court!  	Jason raises his silver blade high.  
[19]		Asshole that does not count as a kill.  
[20]		Oh, come on!  	JASON is confused. He spins and slashed taking Dallas' head clean off. 	The head falls to the ground, then Dallas speaks.  
[21]		Alright, asshole.  	The sound of an ENGINE SHUTTING DOWN.  	Jason finds himself standing alone on a huge open court, all white, 	sterile.  	No creatures, no Dallas or Azrael. A both ends of the white garganuan 	room we see a small tinted glass.  	Azrael's voice booms over a loud speaker.  
[22]		Clear off the court, asshole.  
[23]		Yeah yeah I better call the labs, 		see what the hell is going on.  	Jason stares at the tinted glass of Azrael's booth.  
[24]			 		Lab...this is AZ in the game grid. 		Your guy got out and runined our game.  
[25]			 		I said the guy in the mask is in here 		ruining our game.  	Jason starts to close in on Azrael's pod.  
[26]			 		Send someone to the grid to pick 		him up. He looks lost.  
[27]			 		All right fine, we'll head back--  	Suddenly, JASON shoves his fist through the glass.
dialogues.Dallas:
[1]		Punk?  	Dallas slaps Azrael across the back of the head as he passes.  
[2]		That's nine to four, geek-boy.  
[3]		You got lucky. I could have waited until he 		ate your head.  
[4]		He's good.  	Azrael smiles knowingly. He takes aim and lets loose a blast at Jason. 	Aliens scatter as the blasts hits Jason dead on. Dallas joins in 	unloading on the hulinking terror.  	THeir assault has no effect on Jason whatsoever.  
[5]		That sucks. Why won't he go down?  
[6]		He's not part of the program.  
[7]		No, we're playing a game...not you numbnuts...  	SLASH! The blade slices through Azrael's shoulder to the bottom of his 	rib cage. Blood spurts 	as his right side pulls away from his body. Azrael does not seem hurt, 	only pissed.  
[8]		Yes it does.  
[9]		Okay, enough of this shit.  
[10]		I don't have all day, kid.  
[11]		Jesus!  	The sounds of Azrael's DEATH broadcast over the lab.  	When Jason retrieves his hand, he holds a bloody mass of Azrael's 	insides.  	IN THE LAB, Brodski takes charge.  
[12]			 		Sarge! Get the fuck down here! 		We got a real shitstorm in the --  	DALLAS fights to get out of his virtual reality suit and get himself 	into combat mode...BUT...  	JASON hears the movement. Turns, flings his silver blade.  	It flies across the room, throught the glass and impales Dallas' throat 	to his chair.  	The blade shrots out the electronics in the grid and plunges the room to 	black.
dialogues.14:
[1]		The air's laced with type two ozone, 		it reads as a solid.

As the gas and steam clear - we hear the sound of CRACKING ICE, see a 	jagged mass of frozen crystals . . . and within it . . . a body. JANESSA screams as JASON'S BODY, stiff as a board, CRASHES to the ground 	sending ice shrapnel everywhere!
